titles.title: Jesus, I Am Calling On You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus, I am calling on You.
Jesus, Jesus, only you can see me through.
Jesus, Jesus, no one can do like You do.
Jesus, I am calling on You.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will call on the Lord
Who is worthy to be praised.
I will call on the Lord
So shall I be saved from my enemies.
